title: [idor] Unauthorized Read access to all the private posts(Including Photos,Videos,Gifs)

summaries.content: Researcher was able to access private user content by calling the post ID.
summaries.content_html: Researcher was able to access private user content by calling the post ID.

activities.message: Thank you for your submission. We're looking into this now and get back to you soon. Please bear with us while we confirm this vulnerability and transfer the information to our developers.
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your submission. We're looking into this now and get back to you soon. Please bear with us while we confirm this vulnerability and transfer the information to our developers.

additional_data.new_title: [idor] Unauthorized Read access to all the private posts(Including Photos,Videos,Gifs)
additional_data.old_title: Unauthorized Read access to all the private posts(Including Photos,Videos,Gifs) of Pornhub (Logical Error )

activities.message:
Hi Vijay. I need you to clarify this for me. 
As a logged in user, I am able to visit this link and see this post:
`http://www.pornhub.com/users/victim1110/post/stream_posts_photos/156228461`

It shows that a private photo has been posted but I am not able to access the photo. I don't think I'm seeing anything I shouldn't be.
Please post working example URLs in the report rather than in the video PoC.

Thanks.

Thanks.

activities.message:
@jsacks  :  Sorry for the trouble here. Actually I keep changing my privacy setting for testing different type of privacy and IDOR bugs. You are able to see the links because  i have changed stream as public.
I am changing my stream again to Private so only my friends should be able to view my Stream posts.

1.A normal Post link : 
http://www.pornhub.com/users/victim1110/post/stream_posts_users/163236721
open this link and you won't be able to see the post.
Change it to : 
http://www.pornhub.com/users/[your_username]/post/stream_posts_users/163236721
Fill your username in the place of your_username and you will be able to see the private post which only victim's friends can see.

2. A photo Post link : 
http://www.pornhub.com/users/victim1110/post/stream_posts_photos/156275521
open this link and you won't be able to see the post.
Change this to : 
http://www.pornhub.com/users/[Your_username]/post/stream_posts_photos/156275521
Fill your username in the place of your_username and you will be able to see the private photo post which only victim's friends can see.

3.A playlist post link : 
http://www.pornhub.com/users/victim1110/post/stream_posts_playlists/150865771
open this link and you won't be able to see the post.

Change it to : 
http://www.pornhub.com/users/[Your_username]/post/stream_posts_playlists/150865771
Fill your username in the place of your_username and you will be able to see the private Playlist post which only victim's friends can see.

Same effect will happen in the case of Video o,Gif etc. type of posts as well. 

Reason behind seeing the posts public before because i changed my privacy settings of stream as public. Kindly check above 2 case scenarios for testing this issue and let me know if you still have issue reproducing this issue.

Best Regards !
Vijay Kumar

activities.message: Confirmed. Please stand by while we look into this.
activities.markdown_message: Confirmed. Please stand by while we look into this.

vulnerability_information_html:
Hi Team,

Description : It's a very simple but very impact full issue. Pornhub have privacy feature for streams where you can hide your stream(private). Only your friends can see your stream but there is way it can be bypass this and all the private streams can be seen on pornhub.

Steps to reproduce :
1.Create a profile with username Victim and go to his profile setting --> preferences --> stream preferences.
2.In stream preferences you will see the option of who can see your stream with two options everyone and only friends.
3.Set Only Friends option here. Now go to your profile and post on your stream(You can post photos ,videos etc.). Let's say your post id is = "12345" A simple post will a link something like : http://www.pornhub.com/users/victim/post/stream_posts_users/12345

Open this link and you can see your post now. Since you have set the privacy for your stream so only your friends can see this post.

  1. Now create One more profile with the username Attacker and try to open Victim's profile. You will see the message saying that stream is private.Even if you try to open the same link mentioned above ,it will tell you the same message again.
    1. Try to open this URL : http://www.pornhub.com/users/victim/post/stream_posts_users/12345. You will notice that Attacker is not able to open this Post.
  2. Now change this url to : http://www.pornhub.com/users/Attacker/post/stream_posts_users/12345

So you have just changed the Username part in this link and you will see that you are able to see the post now. This works on each type of post of stream. Ex: Photos,videos , Gifs etc.

So basically the trick here is open the link with your username and change the post ID to any private/public post ID and you can read/view private stream posts of any user of pornhub now.

Providing you the Video POC for more understanding :

https://youtu.be/CUeM15NSmYA

Let me know if you need any other information regarding this issue.

Best Regards !
Vijay Kumar
vulnerability_information:
Hi Team,

Description : It's a very simple but very impact full issue.  Pornhub have privacy feature for streams where you can hide your stream(private). Only your friends can see your stream but there is way it  can be bypass this and all the private streams can be seen on pornhub.

Steps to reproduce : 
1.Create a profile with username Victim and go to his profile setting --> preferences --> stream preferences.
2.In stream preferences you will see the option of who can see your stream with two options everyone and only friends.
3.Set  Only Friends option here. Now go to your profile and post on your stream(You can post photos ,videos etc.). Let's say your post id is = "12345" A simple post will a link something like :  http://www.pornhub.com/users/victim/post/stream_posts_users/12345

Open this link and you can see your post now. Since you have set the privacy for your stream so only your friends can see this post.
4. Now create One more profile with the username Attacker and try to open Victim's profile. You will see the message saying that stream is private.Even if you try to open the same link mentioned above ,it will tell you the same message again.
 5. Try to open this URL :  http://www.pornhub.com/users/victim/post/stream_posts_users/12345.
You will notice that Attacker is not able to open this Post. 
6. Now change this url to : http://www.pornhub.com/users/Attacker/post/stream_posts_users/12345

So you have just changed the Username part in this link and you will see that you are able to see the post now. This works on each type of post of stream. Ex: Photos,videos , Gifs etc.

So basically  the trick here is open the link with your username and change the post ID to any private/public post ID and you can read/view private stream posts of any user of pornhub now. 

Providing you the Video POC for more understanding :

https://youtu.be/CUeM15NSmYA


Let me know if you need any other information regarding this issue.

Best Regards !
Vijay Kumar
